Module the_project
Package hotel

Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
hotel.Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object
Creates and display menu which allows the selection of RoomType # RoomType The menu of RoomType is as follows {(RoomType-Index): Single-0, Double-1, Deluxe-2, VIP-3}. Code also assumes that there are a total of 60 rooms in the Hotel object; of the 60 rooms - 24 are Single Rooms, 24 are Double Rooms, 8 are Deluxe Rooms, and 4 are VIP Suite
Since:
2022-03-15
Version:
7.0
Author:
Isaac, Yan kai, Davis, Wenlu, Tomoki

  • Constructor Details

    • Hotel

      public Hotel()
      Creates and display menu which allows the selection of RoomType # RoomType The menu of RoomType is as follows {(RoomType-Index): Single-0, Double-1, Deluxe-2, VIP-3} Code also assumes that there are a total of 60 rooms in the Hotel object; of the 60 rooms - 24 are Single Rooms, 24 are Double Rooms, 8 are Deluxe Rooms, and 4 are VIP Suite

  • Method Details

    • addGuests

      public void addGuests(Reservation reservation) throws ArrayException
      addGuests method allows the guest to be added into the Hotel class (and hence Room AvailStatus to be marked as OCCUPIED) An Exception would also be thrown upon an error
      Parameters:
      reservation - hold the guests' essential information (id, credit card information, contact details, gender). this is needed for the guests to be added into the Hotel class
      Throws:
      ArrayException - occurs upon an error and error message would be printed accordingly

    • removeGuests

      public void removeGuests(Reservation reservation) throws ArrayException
      removeGuests method allows the guest to be removed from the Hotel class (and hence Room AvailStatus to be marked as VACANT). An Exception would also be thrown upon an error
      Parameters:
      reservation - hold the guests' essential information (id, credit card information, contact details, gender) this is needed for the guests to be removed from the Hotel class
      Throws:
      ArrayException - occurs upon an error and error message would be printed accordingly

    • getGuest

      public Guest getGuest()
      getGuest method allows the guest details to be retrieved from the Hotel class (and hence no changes to the Room AvailStatus). An Exception would also be thrown upon an error
      Returns:
      Guest with the details (id, credit card information, contact details, gender)

    • addReservation

      public void addReservation(Reservation reservation) throws ArrayException
      addReservation method allows the reserver to be added into the Hotel class (and hence Room AvailStatus to be marked as RESERVED) An Exception would also be thrown upon an error
      Parameters:
      reservation - is needed for the reservation to be added to the Hotel class
      Throws:
      ArrayException - occurs upon an error and error message would be printed accordingly

    • removeReservation

      public void removeReservation(Reservation reservation) throws ArrayException
      removeReservation method allows the reserver to be removed from the Hotel class (and hence Room AvailStatus to be marked as VACANT). An Exception would also be thrown upon an error
      Parameters:
      reservation - is needed for the reservation to be removed from the Hotel class
      Throws:
      ArrayException - occurs upon an error and error message would be printed accordingly

    • getReservation

      public Reservation getReservation()
      getReservation method allows the reservation to be retrieved from the Hotel class An Exception would also be thrown upon an error
      Returns:
      reservation hold the reserver's essential information (id, credit card information, contact details, gender) this is needed for the reserver details to be retrieved from the Hotel class

    • getEarliestReservation

      public Reservation getEarliestReservation(ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
      getEarliestReservation method allows the earliest reserver details to be retrieved from the Hotel class (and hence no changes to the Room AvailStatus). The earliest reservation means the closest reservation in which reserver has to check in by from the given time Once the reservation check in has lapsed and reserver has yet to book in; the reservation would be invalid (Room AvailStatus to be marked as VACANT). An Exception would also be thrown upon an error
      Parameters:
      reservationList - this is the array which contains the details of the reserver (id, credit card information, contact details, gender) this is required to find the earliest reservation by array traversal
      Returns:
      returns the reserver and its details that has the earliest reservation by array traversal

    • getRoomReservationList

      public ArrayList<Reservation> getRoomReservationList(Room room)
      getRoomReservationList method returns a list of all reservations for that given room in the Hotel class
      Parameters:
      room - this is the room for which the method retrieves the room reservation list this is required to find room reservation list for the room stated in the parameter
      Returns:
      this is room reservation list

    • reservationInfo

      public void reservationInfo()
      reservationInfo prints all current reservations with the Hotel

    • getReservationList

      public ArrayList<Reservation> getReservationList()
      this method retrieves the reservation list in the Hotel class
      Returns:
      this is the reservation list

    • getVacantRoom

      public Room getVacantRoom(TypeOfRoom roomType)
      getVacantRoom returns the first Room that is vacant (i.e. has an AvailStatus of VACANT) for the specified roomType when the Room is returned (i.e. VACANT room), it can be reserved
      Parameters:
      roomType - this is the type of room under which to check the first Room that is vacant this is required so as to specify which type of room is vacancy being checked for
      Returns:
      this is the Room which is VACANT for the given room type in the parameter

    • getRoom

      public Room getRoom()
      getRoom returns the Room under the Hotel object
      Returns:
      this returns the Room object

    • getSameTypeRooms

      public ArrayList<Room> getSameTypeRooms(TypeOfRoom roomType)
      this returns the array of Room object and its details under the given roomType (SINGLE, DOUBLE, DELUXE, VIPSUITE)
      Parameters:
      roomType - this is the room type of the array of room object to be retrieved (SINGLE, DOUBLE, DELUXE, VIPSUITE)
      Returns:
      this is the array of room object retrieved

    • getSpecificRoom

      public Room getSpecificRoom(String roomNum)
      This method is solely used in the deserialization process
      Parameters:
      roomNum - is the required room number
      Returns:
      returns desired room or null if room don't exist

    • getMenu

      public Menu getMenu(int choice)
      getMenu method allows the Menu object for that specified index to be retrieved
      Parameters:
      choice - this is the index specified of the Menu object to be returned
      Returns:
      this is the Menu object that is retrieved
